ruleBookInfo.kind:
#list > div.book-main > div.book-text > div.tag > span.blue@text&&
#list > div.book-main > div.book-text > div.tag > span.red@text&&
#list > div.book-main > div.book-text > div.tag > span.green@text&&
#list > div.block-title > p.update-text > span@text

ruleExplore.author: div.book-info > p.author@text
ruleExplore.bookList:
#main > div.main-content-2 > div.all-book-list > ul > li||
#main > div.main-content > div > div.rank-box > div > ul > li
ruleExplore.kind:
div.book-info > p.tag > span.blue@text&&
div.book-info > p.tag > span.red@text&&
div.book-info > p.tag > span.green@text
ruleExplore.name:
div.book-info > h4 > a@text||
a@text
